text: ( Source : University of Otago ) Monday, 12 October 2015 12:43pm Emeritus Professor Sir Alan Mark Emeritus Professor Sir Alan Mark is one of New Zealand's best-known conservationists. As long-time Professor of Botany at the University of Otago
